attributes.action: Extend the 28th February Job Retention Scheme deadline for new hires
attributes.additional_details: This deadline decision will impact many workers who have recently changed company/job after 28th February and who may be left with nothing should their company make them redundant as a consequence of their inability to access the Job Retention Scheme for these new employees
attributes.background: Currently the scheme only covers employees who were on their company’s payroll on or before 28th February 2020. Extend this date to the middle of March 2020 when the Covid-19 restrictions were put in place in the U.K. and most companies stopped hiring.
